products.title: Burst Campfire Smoke Roller Blind
products.description: The slightly darker grey colour of the burst campfire smoke is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern, darker grey colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and soft greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Burst Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: Warm and creamy, the burst pearl is the perfect blind if you are needing a lightly coloured blind but white is too sharp for your tastes. Working well with earthier natural colours like browns and greens for a warm ambience or blues, whites and random netting on the wall for a nautical theme. An absolute classic, the pearl will always be the best of beige. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) black smoke is a colour that you perhaps don't expect to find all that often, but it's certainly a welcome surprise when you find it staring right back at you. The beauty of the washed blue is that it clearly sits atop a foundation of light grey that gives it a natural stone-like quality. This is a fabric that has 'versatility' as its middle name, so why not embrace the new creative avenues that it opens? It's all about allowing your individuality to run free so that you can really put your own stamp on things.

products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout Linen Roller Blind
products.description: Stylish & contemporay blackout linen is the dream nuetral for your home or office. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.

products.title: Ecowood, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The flawless finish of the ecowood in devon cream satin is given by the satin-matt cream paint used to coat the hardwearing faux wood slats. For adjustable light, ventilation, and privacy, simply move and tilt the slats to suit your needs. Insert the devon cream satin into a natural and light decor scheme, furnishing the room with bare and painted wickers, unfinished woods, and organic hessians. Paint the walls in cream or oatmeal and include a large jute rug for added rural flair.

products.title: Ecowood, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there's the added bonus of moisture-resistance and strong durability. Team the blizzard grey fine grain with a monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary living room. Stick to pure white walls and add in furniture in varying tones of black and grey, throwing in some plush fabrics to counteract the hard lines and colours.

products.title: Ecowood, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Convincingly textured to produce the look and feel of genuine wood, the ecowood in country fine grain is in fact formed from hardwearing pvc. This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resistant, making it an ideal choice for a family bathroom or kitchen. Go all-out outdoorsy in your living room by partnering the country fine grain with forest and grass greens and natural, organic browns.

products.title: Ecowood, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In true french style, the ecowood in chateau fine grain has a demure, understated tone, making it ideal for homely, vintage feel. Matching rails and control cords provide complete colour coordination, so that you can be sure that nothing will distract from this pretty, faux wood blind. Incorporate the chateau fine grain into a romantically styled bathroom, where the tiling is a creamy off-white and the walls are painted in pale vintage pink.
